org.ow2.bonita.facade
Interface BAMAPI

public interface BAMAPI

This class provides a brief overview of Bonita Business Activity Monitoring.
Note: Using this API can affect engine performances.

Author:
Matthieu Chaffotte

getNumberOfExecutingCasesPerDay

java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getNumberOfExecutingCasesPerDay(java.util.Date since)
Gets the list of the number of executing cases (process instances) per day of every users.

Parameters:
since - the starting date
Returns:
the list of executing cases number per day

Parameters:

since -
Returns:
the number of finished steps.

getNumberOfOpenSteps

int getNumberOfOpenSteps()
Gets the total number of open steps (i.e. tasks) of every users. An open step is a step which is on time.

Returns:
the number of open steps

getNumberOfOpenSteps

int getNumberOfOpenSteps(int priority)
Gets the total number of open steps (i.e. tasks) of every users according to the step priority.

Parameters:
priority - the step priority
Returns:
the number of open steps

getNumberOfOpenStepsPerDay

java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getNumberOfOpenStepsPerDay(java.util.Date since)
Gets the number of open steps of every users for every days since the given day.

Parameters:
since - the day
Returns:
a list the number of open steps for each day from the given day

getNumberOfOverdueSteps

int getNumberOfOverdueSteps()
Gets the total number of overdue steps (i.e. tasks) of every users. An overdue task is a task which its ended date is exceeded.

Returns:
the number of overdue steps.

getNumberOfStepsAtRisk

int getNumberOfStepsAtRisk(int remainingDays)
Gets the total number of steps at risk (i.e. tasks) of every users. A step at risk is a step which its ended date is close to exceed according to the remaining days.

Parameters:
remainingDays - the remaining days before the ended step date is exceeded.
Returns:
the number of steps at risk of every users.

getNumberOfUserFinishedSteps

Gets the total number of finished steps of the logged user since the given date according to the step priority.

Parameters:
priority - the step priority
since -
Returns:
the number of finished steps.

getNumberOfUserOpenSteps

getNumberOfUserOpenSteps

Gets the number of open steps of the logged user according to the step priority.

Parameters:
priority - the step priority
Returns:
the number of open step of the logged user

getNumberOfUserOverdueSteps

int getNumberOfUserOverdueSteps()
Gets the number of overdue steps (i.e. tasks) of the logged user. An overdue task is a task which its ended date is exceeded.

Returns:
the number of overdue steps of the logged user.

getNumberOfUserStepsAtRisk

int getNumberOfUserStepsAtRisk(int remainingDays)
Gets the number of steps at risk (i.e. tasks) of the logged user. A step at risk is a step which its ended date is close to exceed according to the remaining days.

Parameters:
remainingDays - the remaining days before the ended step date is exceeded.
Returns:
the number of steps at risk of the logged user.
